thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com
thread.title: Dan
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von Dan

author: Dan
title: Dan
text: I used Munich Ski shuttle to transport myself and my family from Munich airport to Solden ski resort and back , early February 2117.The Service was excellent and very professional. Erik and his team were efficient, punctual and always in contact . The vehicles were comfortable Mercedes which let us all have a sleep!! and cold water was provided for the journeys. I would recommend this service to anyone. 5 Stars!! Dan
